item.title: Free Aws Ec2 Instance
item.author: Victor Ma
item.description: Create a free Linux EC2 instance Free Trial: Try Amazon EC2 t4g.small instances powered by AWS Graviton2 processors free for up to 750 hours / month until Dec 31st 2023. https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/new-t4g-instances-burstable-performance-powered-by-aws-graviton2/ Found the latest debian 11 arm64 AMI which could be launched as t4g.small 1 2 3 4 5 LATEST_AMI_NAME=$(aws ec2 describe-images --owners amazon \ --filters "Name=name,Values=debian-11-arm64*" "Name=virtualization-type,Values=hvm" "Name=architecture,Values=arm64" \ --query 'sort_by(Images, &CreationDate)[-1].[ImageId]' \ --output text) aws ec2 describe-images --image-ids $LATEST_AMI_NAME Create a userData file to initialize the instance with your necessary tools
